block.para: Shows how to use the &Python3long; to create a REST service that tracks work items in &DDBlong; and emails reports by using &SESlong; (&SES;). This example uses the Flask web framework to handle HTTP routing and integrates with a React webpage to present a fully functional web application.

listitem.para: Build a Flask REST service that integrates with &AWS-services;.
Read, write, and update work items that are stored in a &DDB; table.
Use &SES; to send email reports of work items.

block.para: For complete source code and instructions on how to set up and run, see the full example in the &AWS; Code Examples Repository on GitHub.
